## Source: kam193 (c814029b088c2f3c40eae7fa25825a2591291fe9b69892dbe3963c9645d3951f)
During installation of the source package, it attempts to silently download and start a remote executable. At the time of analysis, the downloading link did not work.


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.

 - Downloads and executes a remote executable.
